name: MontbrioPazoRoxin

V.expression: (V * V - np.pi * np.pi * tau * tau * r * r + eta + J * tau * r + I + cr * Cr + cv * CV) / tau

references: [Montbrio_Pazo_Roxin_2015] Montbrió, E., Pazó, D., & Roxin, A. (2015). Macroscopic description for networks of spiking neurons. *Physical Review X*, 5(2), 021028.
